description: Holds the collection of tags, categories, keywords, etc that describe content.
title: Taxonomy

$eref.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
$eref.title: Has additional properties

___associated_tasks.description: A list of WebSked task IDs that this content was created or curated to satisfy.

___topics.description: A list of topics. In the Arc ecosystem, this list is populated by Clavis.

$eref.description: Models a topic used in describing a piece of content.
$eref.title: Topic

___name.description: The general name for this topic.

___uid.description: A short identifier for this topic. Usually used in cases where a long form id cannot work.

____id.description: The unique identifier for this topic.

___score.description: An arbitrary weighting to give the topic

$eref.description: Models a keyword used in describing a piece of content.
$eref.title: Tag

___text.description: The text of the tag as displayed to users.

___description.description: A more detailed description of the tag.

___seo_keywords.description: A list of user-editable manually entered keywords for search purposes. In the Arc ecosystem, these can be generated and saved in source CMS systems, editors, etc.

___sections.description: A list of site objects or references to them. In the Arc ecosystem, references in this list are denormalized into sites from the arc-site-service.  In a multi-site context, sites will be denormalized against an organization's default website only.

$eref.description: A hierarchical section in a taxonomy. In the Arc ecosystem, these are stored in the arc-site-service.
$eref.title: Section

___description.description: A short description or tagline about this site

___parent_id.description: The id of this section's parent section in the default hierarchy, if any.

___parent.description: The id of this section's parent section in various commonly-used hierarchies, where available.

___path.description: The url path to this site

$eref.description: This represents a reference to external content that should be denormalized
$eref.title: Representation of a normalized element

___referent_properties.description: An object for key-value pairs that should override the values of keys with the same name in the denormalized object

___website.description: The website which the referenced id belongs to. Currently supported only for sections.

___type.description: The ANS type that the provider should return.

___provider.description: A URL that can resolve the id into an ANS element

___id.description: The id passed to the provider to retrieve an ANS document

___service.description: The type of interaction the provider expects. E.g., 'oembed'

$eref.description: A hierarchical section or 'site' in a taxonomy. In the Arc ecosystem, these are stored in the arc-site-service.
$eref.title: Site

___description.description: A short description or tagline about this site

___parent_id.description: The id of this section's parent site, if any

___path.description: The url path to this site

$eref.description: This represents a reference to external content that should be denormalized
$eref.title: Representation of a normalized element

___referent_properties.description: An object for key-value pairs that should override the values of keys with the same name in the denormalized object

___website.description: The website which the referenced id belongs to. Currently supported only for sections.

___type.description: The ANS type that the provider should return.

___provider.description: A URL that can resolve the id into an ANS element

___id.description: The id passed to the provider to retrieve an ANS document

___service.description: The type of interaction the provider expects. E.g., 'oembed'

___primary_site.description: Deprecated in 0.7.1. (See `primary_section` instead.) A primary site object or reference to one. In the Arc ecosystem, a reference here is denormalized into a site from the arc-site-service.

$eref.description: A hierarchical section in a taxonomy. In the Arc ecosystem, these are stored in the arc-site-service.
$eref.title: Section

___description.description: A short description or tagline about this site

___parent_id.description: The id of this section's parent section in the default hierarchy, if any.

___parent.description: The id of this section's parent section in various commonly-used hierarchies, where available.

___path.description: The url path to this site

$eref.description: This represents a reference to external content that should be denormalized
$eref.title: Representation of a normalized element

___referent_properties.description: An object for key-value pairs that should override the values of keys with the same name in the denormalized object

___website.description: The website which the referenced id belongs to. Currently supported only for sections.

___type.description: The ANS type that the provider should return.

___provider.description: A URL that can resolve the id into an ANS element

___id.description: The id passed to the provider to retrieve an ANS document

___service.description: The type of interaction the provider expects. E.g., 'oembed'

___primary_section.description: A primary section object or reference to one. In the Arc ecosystem, a reference here is denormalized into a site from the arc-site-service.

___sites.description: Deprecated in 0.7.1. (See `sections` instead.) A list of site objects or references to them. In the Arc ecosystem, references in this list are denormalized into sites from the arc-site-service.  In a multi-site context, sites will be denormalized against an organization's default website only.

$eref.description: A hierarchical section or 'site' in a taxonomy. In the Arc ecosystem, these are stored in the arc-site-service.
$eref.title: Site

___description.description: A short description or tagline about this site

___parent_id.description: The id of this section's parent site, if any

___path.description: The url path to this site

$eref.description: This represents a reference to external content that should be denormalized
$eref.title: Representation of a normalized element

___referent_properties.description: An object for key-value pairs that should override the values of keys with the same name in the denormalized object

___website.description: The website which the referenced id belongs to. Currently supported only for sections.

___type.description: The ANS type that the provider should return.

___provider.description: A URL that can resolve the id into an ANS element

___id.description: The id passed to the provider to retrieve an ANS document

___service.description: The type of interaction the provider expects. E.g., 'oembed'

___stock_symbols.description: A list of stock symbols of companies related to this content. In the Arc ecosystem, these can be generated and saved in source CMS systems, editors, etc.

___named_entities.description: A list of named entities. In the Arc ecosystem, this list is populated by Clavis.

$eref.description: Models a named entity (i.e. name of a person, place, or organization) used in a piece of content.
$eref.title: Named Entity

___name.description: The actual string of text that was identified as a named entity.

___type.description: A description of what the named entity is. E.g. 'organization', 'person', or 'location'.

____id.description: A unique identifier for the concept of the named entity.

___score.decription: An optional relevancy for this named entitiy.

___keywords.description: A list of keywords. In the Arc ecosystem, this list is populated by Clavis.

$eref.description: Models a keyword used in describing a piece of content.
$eref.title: Keyword

___keyword.description: The keyword used to describe a piece of content

___frequency.description: An optional count of the frequency of the keyword as it appears in the content it describes

___score.description: An arbitrary weighting to give the keyword

___tag.description: The Part of Speech tag for this keyword.

___auxiliaries.description: A list of auxiliaries. In the Arc ecosystem, this list is populated by Clavis.

$eref.description: Models a auxiliary used in targeting a piece of content.
$eref.title: Auxiliary

___name.description: The general name for this auxiliary.

___uid.description: A short identifier for this auxiliary. Usually used in cases where a long form id cannot work.

____id.description: The unique identifier for this auxiliary.
